N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 813.8 - Compensation for consulting services

State Regulations
(a) The consultant selected by the city shall propose a fee for his services in
preparing the local law. The basis for the fee shall be stated. The proposed
fee for consulting services shall be based on: (1)

Lump sum, taking into account reasonable
consulting costs for similar work, or
(2)

An audited consulting payroll cost
required to perform the work, plus a reasonable amount to cover overhead and
profit, and as agreed to between the consultant, the commissioner and the
city. (3)
A combination of (1) and
(2). Notes
